Package com.aep.dao

Class TeachRequestDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.aep.dao.TeachRequestDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TeachRequestDAO
public class TeachRequestDAOImpl extends Object implements TeachRequestDAO
Implementation of the TeachRequestDAO interface. Handles database interactions for the TeachRequest table. Provides methods to create, read, and update teach requests in the database.
